subject: Skiing
lead_paragraph: The American Lindsey Vonn and her friendly German rival, Maria Riesch, will compete in four consecutive skiing races over four days to determine the 2011 FIS Overall World Cup champion.
snippet: The American Lindsey Vonn and her friendly German rival, Maria Riesch, will compete in four consecutive skiing races over four days to determine the 2011 FIS Overall World Cup champion.
